title: Can my computer use my phone's data connection through Bluetooth?
answer:
Your computer cannot use your phone's data connection to access the Internet using Bluetooth. But you can set up a connection between your computer and phone. You can also connect your phone to other Bluetooth-capable devices and play games together. 

 Your phone supports Bluetooth games. The method of using this function varies with the third-party games. General steps are as follows: 

 1. Open the game and search for other Bluetooth-capable devices. 

 1. Pair your phone with another device. 

 1. [Start the game.]()
